trans-unit.source: Defines the interface implemented by the environment hosting the workflow designer and compiler to provide environment-specific compilation information during the validation and compilation processes.
trans-unit.target: 定義由環境裝載工作流程設計工具和編譯器，提供環境特定的編譯資訊的驗證和編譯處理程序期間所實作的介面。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether types are checked.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否已選取型別。

trans-unit.source: During the validation phase of workflow compilation, a workflow source document is rejected if the CheckTypes property is `true` and the workflow or the companion rules file directly references any .NET Framework types not present on a list of authorized types.
trans-unit.target: 在工作流程編譯的驗證階段，工作流程來源文件遭拒 CheckTypes 屬性是否`true`與工作流程或附屬規則檔案直接參考的已授權型清單不存在任何.NET Framework 型別。

trans-unit.source: The list of authorized types is an XML document where each entry indicates an `Assembly`, a `Namespace`, a `TypeName`, and an `Authorized` {`true` or `false`} indicator.
trans-unit.target: 已授權型清單是 XML 文件其中每個項目表示`Assembly`、 `Namespace`、 `TypeName`，和`Authorized`{`true`或`false`} 指標。

trans-unit.source: This class corresponds to an entry on the list.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會對應到清單上的項目。

trans-unit.source: Also note that wildcard character designations are allowed, to include or exclude complete namespaces.
trans-unit.target: 也請注意，允許指定萬用字元，以包含或排除完整的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: For example, using `Type=”System.*”` includes all types in <xref:System>, including types contained in child namespaces.
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用`Type=”System.*”`包括中的所有類型<xref:System>，包括子命名空間中所包含的類型。</xref:System>

trans-unit.source: The use of a list of authorized types is controlled by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompiler> option **/checktypes** or by using the CheckTypes property.
trans-unit.target: 已授權型清單的使用由<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompiler>選項**/checktypes**或使用 CheckTypes 屬性。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompiler>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if types are checked, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已選取型別，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the programming language used by the environment, such as Visual Studio, when compiling the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 取得當編譯工作流程環境，例如 Visual Studio 中，所使用的程式設計語言。

trans-unit.source: The name of the programming language used by the development environment.
trans-unit.target: 開發環境所使用的程式設計語言名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the root namespace set for the project.
trans-unit.target: 取得設定專案的根命名空間。

trans-unit.source: This property is used in Visual Basic compilation environment to pass the root namespace of the project to the compiler.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性用於 Visual Basic 編譯環境中，將專案的根命名空間至編譯器。

trans-unit.source: The name of the root namespace.
